survey_brief: This survey aims to evaluate the effectiveness and satisfaction of participants with the professional development courses offered by the organization.

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the overall quality of the professional development courses you attended?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale to measure satisfaction levels effectively.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the overall quality of the professional development courses you attended?

questions.question_text: Which of the following topics would you like to see covered in future professional development courses? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Allow for multiple selections to gather comprehensive feedback on desired topics.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: Checkbox (multi-choice) with an optional open-text field for 'Other'.

script.question_text: Which of the following topics would you like to see covered in future professional development courses? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How has the professional development course impacted your job performance?
questions.client_notes: This question helps measure the direct impact of the courses on job performance.

script.question_text: How has the professional development course impacted your job performance?

questions.question_text: What additional support or resources would help you apply what you learned in the professional development courses?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to gather qualitative feedback on needed support.

script.question_text: What additional support or resources would help you apply what you learned in the professional development courses?

questions.question_text: Would you recommend these professional development courses to your colleagues?
questions.client_notes: This question measures the likelihood of word-of-mouth promotion.

script.question_text: Would you recommend these professional development courses to your colleagues?
